activities:
Upon registration to the site, user provides email address, password, name and username.
Registered user may also provide billing address.
Registered user may upload, input, store, access and/or share his or her genetic data, including genotypic data.
Registered user may upload, input, store, access and/or share his or her phenotypic information. 
Registered user may authorize for genetic and/or phenotypic information to be accessible to third-party software applications via the Site's application programming interface (API).
Registered user may connect electronic devices such as wearable electronic devices to his or her account at Site such that the electronic device provides data about the user that is stored in the user's account at Site.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Coverage extends to registered users of the website and includes email, password, name, username, genetic data of the user and phenotypic data of the user. Information such as email, password, name, username and phenotypic data may be manually entered by the Site user or a representative of the user. Genetic data and phenotypic data may be uploaded by the Site user or a representative of the user.
